title: 1 Acre Coconut Land For Sale at Kudawa At A Bargain Price
details:
Property Ref : Funkfarnest

This is a beautiful 1 acre coconut land that is available immediate for sale. The land is located in the village of Kudawa and is just walking distance to the beach

Kudawa is known for it's pristine beaches and one of the fast developing areas in Kalpitiya. The land is well positioned with many restaurants and tourist hotels in the near vicinity and neighborhood.

The property comes with golden sand and palm trees. This is one of the nicest plots available for sale in the region, located away from the hustle and bustle of city life in a serine environment, perfect for nature loving enthusiasts.

Suitable for personal holiday bungalows, villas or tourism related projects.

Now available for immediate lease with -

- Clear Deed And Title (Sinnakkara)
- Electricity
- Water
- Good Road Access

Asking price - LKR 6.5Mln.

If you are interested,please contact us on 0094 77 77 33 823 for further details.

Thanks For Looking :)
